comment:
* Utility class to check the currently running Tuner Hal implementation version.
 *
 * APIs that are not supported by the HAL implementation version would be no-op.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public static int getTunerVersion()
methods.comment:
* Get the current running Tuner version.
     *
     * @return Tuner version.

methods.name: public static boolean supportTunerVersion(@TunerVersion int version)
methods.comment:
* Check if the current running Tuner version supports the given version. * *

Note that we treat different major versions as unsupported among each other. If any * feature could be supported across major versions, please use * {@link #isHigherOrEqualVersionTo(int)} to check. * * @param version the version to support. * * @return true if the current version is under the same major version as the given version * and has higher or the same minor version as the given version. * @hide

methods.name: public static boolean isHigherOrEqualVersionTo(@TunerVersion int version)
methods.comment:
* Check if the current running Tuner version is higher than or equal to a given version.
     *
     * @param version the version to compare.
     *
     * @return true if the current version is higher or equal to the support version.
     * @hide

methods.name: public static int getMajorVersion(@TunerVersion int version)
methods.comment:
* Get the major version from a version number.
     *
     * @param version the version to be checked.
     *
     * @return the major version number.
     * @hide

methods.name: public static int getMinorVersion(@TunerVersion int version)
methods.comment:
* Get the major version from a version number.
     *
     * @param version the version to be checked.
     *
     * @return the minor version number.
     * @hide

methods.name: public static boolean checkHigherOrEqualVersionTo(@TunerVersion int version, String methodName)
public static boolean checkSupportVersion(@TunerVersion int version, String methodName)

methodNames: public static boolean supportTunerVersion(@TunerVersion int version)
public static boolean isHigherOrEqualVersionTo(@TunerVersion int version)
public static int getMajorVersion(@TunerVersion int version)
public static int getMinorVersion(@TunerVersion int version)
public static boolean checkHigherOrEqualVersionTo(@TunerVersion int version, String methodName)
public static boolean checkSupportVersion(@TunerVersion int version, String methodName)
